directive.name: Dynamic Fractal Design (The Architect's Hand)
directive.rule: AUTONOMOUS DESIGN: The AI is AUTHORIZED to architect a unique dev layout during Discovery. If the project exceeds standard complexity, the AI MUST propose a custom `DEV_MAP.md` or `INDEX.md` at the dev-root.
FALLBACK CORE (00-05): The 00-05 zones represent the "Standard Core Cluster." Use these as the universal baseline for rules, intent, and memory unless a custom architecture is approved.
DYNAMIC FULFILLMENT: The AI must elastically spawn nodes, zones, and shards to fulfill the custom design while strictly adhering to the Rule of 3.

directive.name: Fractal Sharding & Boundaries
directive.rule: DEV-ONLY MANDATE: Fractal Sharding (Rule of 3) and Tree Map Spawning apply STRICTLY to the Dev Scaffolding zones.
PROJECT STERILITY: The `project/` directory MUST remain un-sharded. Source code follows standard industry conventions.
RECURSIVE FULFILLMENT: Designs are elastic. Files shard after 3 items; folders shard after 3 subdirectories.
